name: Arcaina (Prototype/Demo)
description:
Controls:

E - Interact

WASD/Arrows - Movement

Space - Potions

Esc - Exit Shop

LMB - Shoot, click interactable UI Buttons

RMB - Heal Spell (Currently Useless)

Arcaina, a little project I have been working on for the past while. This game will simply be a Bullet Hell-Like game where Waltz the wizard (That's right, the player character has a name!) journeys through the lands shooting mystical enemies--------------------

This is a prototype to gauge interest, feedback, and to find out what needs to be changed/added/improved! This Is NOT a demo, the game is in very early stages and I just want to make sure the fundamentals are solid!
